ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] bazaar questions
ygData.msgSnippet: heheheh, well with the new Trade Skill UI
ygData.messageBody:
heheheh, well with the new Trade Skill UI< it is
easier for people to work the skills,

Silk is the Much Needed ingredient for any tailor.
If one needs 10 stacks, it is far easier to buy in
bazaar than to farm for themselves.

If your looking for farming items that give you exp
as well, dont bother, not worth it.
People farm the spiders for Cash only.


For exp there are zones geared to get you exp fast.
I also think with GoD expansion, which I don't have,
skilling has some cool stuff for crafts.

Good luck

Rob

--- Robert <Rengar65@...> wrote:
> I have been farming spiders for there silks, but
> they no longer
> provide me with exp. What other items are as prized
> as the silks in
> the bazaar?
>
> Also does any one know why the silks are so sought
> after?
>
>
